newsitem.title: EU: EP ECONOMIC COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 29-31.
newsitem.headline: EP ECONOMIC COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 29-31.

text.p: Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs and Industrial Policy [[ Tuesday 29 October 1996 ]] P U B L I C M E E T I N G 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE219.840 ) - the order of business will be decided when the agenda is adopted - a draft timetable may be obtained from the secretariat or at the meeting 2. Approval of minutes of meetings of: - 25-27 June 1996 in Brussels (PE219.512 ) - 8-9 July 1996 in Brussels (PE218.926 ) 3. Chairman's announcements 4. Report by the chairman of the Subcommittee on Monetary Affairs 5. Consideration and adoption of the committee's calendar of meetings for 1997 (PE219.508/REV ) 6. Exchange of views with Mr BRUTON, Irish Minister for Enterprise and Employme nt - Exchange of views on employment policy in the EU - Mr BRUTON will attend on Tuesday 29 October 1996 from 3.10 pm 7. Hearing of Mr DUISENBERG, candidate for the Presidency of the European Monet ary Institute - the hearing of Mr DUISENBERG will take place on Wednesday 30 October 1996 from 9 am; - the hearing will be in public; following the hearing a meeting of the politica l groups will be held in camera; (PE219.999 ) - Mr DUISENBERG's written answers will be treated as confidential until the hear ing; (PE219.520 ) - they will be distributed to members of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs 24 hours before the hearing. 8. Exchange of views with Sir Brian UNWIN, President of the European Investment Bank - Exchange of views on the lending policy priorities, annual balance sheet and f uture developments of the EIB - Sir Brian UNWIN will attend on Wednesday 30 October 1996 from 4.15 pm 9. Hearing on 'SMEs and the craft sector, keys to employment' - the hearing will take place on Thursday 31 October 1996 from 10 am to 12.30 pm; the programme will be available separately (PE219.842 ) 9.1 The craft industry and small enterprises: keys to growth and employment in E urope (second SME conference in Berlin) (T04245) COS0326 COM(95)0502 C4-0503/95 + ECON Fond R TORRES MARQUES H.
